å½“kä¸º1çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼š

public int pick(int[] nums) {
    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n.length; i++) {
        if (new Random().nextInt(i) == 0) {
            res = i;
        }
    }
    return res;
}

entry.title: å¿«æ’&å¿«é€‰
entry.content:
åŸºç¡€å¿«æ’ï¼š

public void quickSort(int[] num, int left, int right) {
        if (left >= right) {
            return;
        }
        int pivot = right;
        int small = left, big = left;
        while (small < right) {
            if (num[small] >= num[pivot]) {
                small++;
            } else {
                swap(num, small, big);
                small++;
                big++;
            }
        }
        swap(num, pivot, big);
        quickSort(num, left, big - 1);
        quickSort(num, big + 1, right);
}

ä¼˜åŒ–-ä¸‰æ•°å–ä¸­ï¼š

public void quickSort(int[] num, int left, int right) {
    if (left >= right) {
        return;
    }
    //ä¸‰æ•°å–ä¸­
    if (right - left > 1) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (num[left] > num[mid]) {
            swap(num, left, mid);
        }
        if (num[left] > num[right]) {
            swap(num, left, right);
        }
        if (num[mid] > num[right]) {
            swap(num, mid, right);
        }
        swap(num, mid, right - 1);
    }

    int pivot = right - 1;
    int small = left + 1, big = left + 1;
    while (small < pivot) {
        if (num[small] >= num[pivot]) {
            small++;
        } else {
            swap(num, small, big);
            small++;
            big++;
        }
    }
    swap(num, pivot, big);
    quickSort(num, left, big - 1);
    quickSort(num, big + 1, right);
}

å¿«é€Ÿé€‰æ‹©ï¼š

public int quickSelect(int[] num, int left, int right, int k) {
    //ä¸‰æ•°å–ä¸­
    reorderThree(num, left, right);

    int pivot = right - 1;
    int small = left + 1, big = left + 1;
    while (small < pivot) {
        if (num[small] >= num[pivot]) {
            small++;
        } else {
            swap(num, small, big);
            small++;
            big++;
        }
    }
    swap(num, pivot, big);
    //ç¬¬kå¤§
    if (num.length - big == k) {
        return num[big];
    }
    if (num.length - big > k) {
        return quickSelect(num, big + 1, right, k);
    }
    return quickSelect(num, left, big - 1, k + big - num.length);
}

javaï¼š

  • åµŒå¥—MAP

      Map<Integer, Map<Integer, V>> map = //...
  // ...
  map.get(2).get(5);

  • pair keyçš„åŒ…è£…ç±»

      public class Key {

      private final int x;
      private final int y;

      public Key(int x, int y) {
          this.x = x;
          this.y = y;
      }

      @Override
      public boolean equals(Object o) {
          if (this == o) return true;
          if (!(o instanceof Key)) return false;
          Key key = (Key) o;
          return x == key.x && y == key.y;
      }

      @Override
      // é‡å†™hashcode
      public int hashCode() {
          int result = x;
          result = 31 * result + y;
          return result;
      }

  }

  • googleçš„hashBasedTable

      import com.google.common.collect.HashBasedTable;
  import com.google.common.collect.Table;

  // åˆ›å»º

  // æ–°å¢
  plane.put(1L, 2L, pointA);
  plane.put(1L, 3L, pointB);
  plane.put(1L, 4L, pointC);

  // è·å–
  Point pointA = plane.get(1L, 2L);
  Point pointB = plane.get(1L, 2L);

entry.title: ç»„åˆæ•°
entry.content:
å…¬å¼æ³•ï¼š
private int getCombination(int n, int k) {
int a = 1, b = 1;
if (k > n / 2) {
k = n - k;
}
for (int i = 1; i <= k; i++) {
a *= (n + 1 - i);
b *= i;
}
return a / b;
}

é€’å½’æ³•ï¼š
private int getCombination1(int n, int k) {
if (k == 0 || n == k) {
return 1;
}
return getCombination1(n - 1, k) + getCombination1(n - 1, k - 1)
}
